mapper.select: select us.user_id, us.tenant_id, us.person_type, us.student_type, us.resident_year, us.create_time, u.user_name, u.real_name, u.user_type, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.idcard_type, u.idcard_numb, u.identity, u.sex, u.status from sys_user_student us inner join sys_user u on us.user_id = u.user_id ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}

SELECT us.user_id, us.tenant_id, us.person_type, us.student_type, us.resident_year, us.create_time, u.user_name, u.real_name, u.user_type, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.idcard_type, u.idcard_numb, u.identity, u.sex, u.status FROM sys_user_student us INNER JOIN sys_user u ON us.user_id = u.user_id ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}
